Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: the 'review-needed' label is reserved for issues that affect production code.

Action.author: elli-androulaki
Action.body: Moved to v1.1, as it is not applicable for v1.0.

Action.author: elli-androulaki
Action.body: No, there has not been another Jira for this. I believe this is still relevant.Â

Action.author: pandrejko
Action.body: ~ales Is this still targetted for Release 1.4? Otherwise can we update the release?

Action.author: ales
Action.body: The whole business of invokable/non invokable system chaincodes has been removed, so this FAB is no longer relevant. We used to have configurable flags that governed the direct (or through cc2cc) invokability of chaincodes, but that has been removed.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Ok, we've added removal of system chaincode plugins FAB-15343 to release notes, I'll close this one.
